Are there any special considerations I need to keep in mind when using the Verus command-line interface on a Windows system?

Yes, there are special considerations to keep in mind when using the Verus command-line interface on a Windows system. You can find more information on Windows command line formatting in the [Remarks on Windows command line formatting](#!faq-windows/winfaq-01_cli_formatting.md).
